55D.title: Preliminary test must be in accordance with directions

1.full_text: A preliminary breath test must be conducted in accordance with the directions for use of the breath analyzing instrument.

2.full_text: The directions must be in writing unless the person who is required to undergo the test is able to read and understand English.

elements.name: written_or_oral_directions
elements.absence_consequence: Procedural invalidity - direction requirement not met

55E.title: Breath analyzing instrument taken to have been properly used
proper_performance_indicators: device has approval for use under regulations
device used as designed by manufacturer
device in working order at time of use
device properly maintained per manufacturer specifications
55E.presumption: Unless contrary proven, device presumed properly used if indicators present
55E.rebuttal_burden: Accused may adduce evidence device not properly used

59.title: The hearsay rule

137.discretion: Court must refuse to admit evidence if probative value substantially outweighed by danger of unfair prejudice to defendant
